meanings.definition: A class of plant hormones that promote cell division and growth.
meanings.sent1: The cytokinin helped the plant cells divide and grow.
meanings.sent2: Farmers use cytokinin to make their crops grow faster.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous plant sprinkled extra cytokinin on its leaves to grow taller than its neighbors.
meanings.sent4: The cytokinin acted like a magical potion, causing the plants to multiply and reach for the sky.
meanings.sent5: In the garden, the cytokinin was like a superhero, speeding up the growth of the flowers.

meanings.definition: Any of various synthetic compounds with similar effects on plant growth.
meanings.sent1: Scientists created a new cytokinin to help plants grow in harsh conditions.
meanings.sent2: The cytokinin in the fertilizer boosted the growth of the tomato plants.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous scientist accidentally spilled cytokinin all over the lab, causing the plants to grow out of control.
meanings.sent4: The cytokinin worked like a charm, transforming the wilted plants into lush greenery.
meanings.sent5: The cytokinin was a secret weapon for the gardener, ensuring vibrant and healthy plants.
